llm.feedback: Add an explicit handle mapping for silver in the opening sentence – e.g., “Silver +15 % over the next 12 months (silver +15 %) (LF0UUL917).”  Keep the gold comparison only as a benchmark; it does not need a separate handle.  Verify that every claim carries a citation (the draft already cites LF0UUL917, Y474W9FO9, Z7O1DCHS7, FAN5RYW6T).  Highlight the catalyst window explicitly: “Fed’s September 2024 policy meeting (Z7O1DCHS7)” and the 2‑yr/10‑yr spread, CPI/PCE releases as real‑time gauges.  Ensure the risk list and watch signals are concise, each linked to the same citations.  No other assets or local micro‑details should appear; the focus must remain on silver and its macro‑financial transmission path.
